summary: This is an email forwarding a news article from The Daily Beast titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's Hollywood Pipeline Ran Straight to Harvey Weinstein'. The email is brief, sent from an iPad, and appears to be sharing the article link with a recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article, which discusses his alleged 'Hollywood pipeline'.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: The article discusses a connection or 'pipeline' between Jeffrey Epstein and Harvey Weinstein.

connections.description: The forwarded article's title suggests an alleged 'Hollywood pipeline' connecting them.

events.title: Email forwarding news article
events.description: An email is sent containing a link to a Daily Beast article about connections between Epstein and Weinstein.

keyFacts: An email dated April 5, 2020, forwards a link to a news article about Jeffrey Epstein and Harvey Weinstein.
The article's title claims 'Jeffrey Epstein's Hollywood Pipeline Ran Straight to Harvey Weinstein'.
The email is sent from an iPad, indicating casual sharing of the article.
